TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SharedPersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo
Public NotInheritable Class SharedPersonalizationStateInfo Inherits PersonalizationStateInfo

summary.span: 表示有关页的共享个性化信息的轻量版本。

span.span: Represents a lightweight version of shared personalization information about a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示有关页的个性化设置状态的统计信息。This class represents statistical information about the personalization state of a page. 它不返回 （例如应用或提取个性化设置发生时的属性数据） 的个性化设置数据本身。It does not return the personalization data (such as property data that is applied or extracted when personalization occurs) itself. 此类可用于确定多少用户已保存个性化设置页上，以及大小，以字节为单位，该信息。This class can be used to determine how many users have saved personalization settings for a page, and the size, in bytes, of that information.

public: SharedPersonalizationStateInfo(System::String ^ path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

param.name: path

span.span: The page that the information applies to.

param.span: 是相对于应用程序（使用波形符语法）的虚拟路径。

span.span: is an application-relative (using tilde syntax) virtual path.

param.name: lastUpdatedDate
param.span: ，指示页的共享信息的上次更新时间。

span.span: A indicating when the shared information for the page was last updated.

param.name: size
param.span: 页的共享状态信息的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the shared state information for the page.

param.name: sizeOfPersonalizations
param.span: 页的现存所有每用户个性化信息的总大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all per-user personalization information that exists for the page.

param.name: countOfPersonalizations
param.span: 已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。

span.span: The total number of users who have personalized the page.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `countOfPersonalizations`参数表示已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。The `countOfPersonalizations` parameter represents the total number of users who have personalized a page. 例如，如果某页，则值 100 个用户进行个性化设置`countOfPersonalizations`该页面将是 100，不是 100 乘以个性化属性的数目。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of `countOfPersonalizations` for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 请注意，此计数可能会或可能与使用基础数据存储区中保留每个用户的信息，因为某些数据存储提供程序使用多个行来存储单个用户和页面的每用户个性化设置信息的总行数不匹配组合。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination. 请注意，`path`修整如果非 null。Note that `path` is trimmed if non-null.

span.span: , when trimmed, is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CountOfPersonalizations As Integer
public: property int CountOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of users that have personalized a page.

value.span: 已应用于页的每用户个性化设置的总数。

span.span: The total number of per-user personalization settings that have been applied to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回已对页进行个性化的用户的总数。This property returns the total number of users that have personalized a page. 例如，如果某页，则值 100 个用户进行个性化设置该页面将是 100，不是 100 乘以个性化属性的数目。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 请注意，此计数可能会或可能与使用基础数据存储区中保留每个用户的信息，因为某些数据存储提供程序使用多个行来存储单个用户和页面的每用户个性化设置信息的总行数不匹配组合。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SizeOfPersonalizations As Integer
public: property int SizeOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取页的所有每用户个性化信息的总大小。

span.span: Gets the total size of all per-user personalization information for a page.

value.span: 页的所有个性化信息的总大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all personalization information for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的页面存在的所有每用户个性化设置信息的大小。This property returns the size of all per-user personalization information that exists for a page. 这将是不同的值返回的值因为是以字节为单位的仅一个页面的每个用户状态大小，不包括共享的状态中包含的数据大小值。This will be a different value than the value returned by because is the size in bytes of only the per-user state for a page and does not include the size of shared state data included in the value.
